name: Lost and Found (Xezien)
description:
[WARNING: THIS GAME HAS FLASHING LIGHTS, LOUD NOISES AND JUMPSCARES!]

Headphones are recommend as the game depends on listening 

WANT TO SUPPORT MY GAME DEVELOPEMENT:

https://ko-fi.com/xezien

DISCORD:

https://discord.gg/EhC43ee7Zp

STORY:
Lost & Found, is a short 3D pixel art style horror where you have lost all your toys, but your nightmare has came to life and is trying to haunt you down...

CONTROLS:
WASD to move around

SHIFT to run (you will always need this)

MOUSE to look around

THE GAME HAS LORE AND SECRET LORE THAT CAN BE FOUND IN THE GAMES FILES!
